name: Blockade (Gameboy)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Pocket. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2021. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby! This game is an entry for the Gameboy Competition 2021. (https://itch.io/jam/gbcompo21)

Original Story:

10 players challenged you to prove their skills.
Show them You're better! This is a small game, made in 2 days.

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys (Left - Right)
Fire: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys (Left - Right)
Fire: Z
